data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Murmansk. Through your servants plant 168 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Murmansk, Russia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Murmansk to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.section_summary: On average, 57 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Murmansk, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please give your people in Murmansk, Russia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Murmansk, Russia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Tabasaran people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, grace the churches in Murmansk, Russia with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Murmansk
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Murmansk, Russia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

location.name: Murmansk
location.people_groups_list: Chechen, Aghul, Abaza, Yukagir, Aleut, Eastern
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Chechen (5,300), Aghul (35,000), Abaza (45,000), Yukagir (1,600), Aleut, Eastern (500)
